name: Score Game 2D
description:
Score Game 2D is the game to lose nerves. Goal of the game is to get World Record and earn the achievement.

Score Game 2D is hard (not really just poorly coded), competitive game for those chasing the "rare" achievements of steam, or those who want to break keyboard like i do. And yes i know it is terrible, there is no need to tell me.

Features

  • poor physics and movement
  • "very hard" to obtain achievement
  • overpriced content (it's a feature)
  • 7 obstacles (i think)
  • at least 30sec of gameplay

Roasts are always welcome. Made game for myself to help me learn the process of publishing and making games as that is something i wanted for a long time. Thank you for trying whatever this is, have fun, and hopefully i see you in my next game.

Music by Patrick de Arteaga
